mapper.select: SELECT id, title, genre, release_year AS releaseYear, rating, summary, review, image, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM movies
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movies(title, genre, release_year, rating, summary, review, image, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{genre}, #{releaseYear}, #{rating}, #{summary}, #{review}, #{image}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
